attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-0227

Date: 2016-04-15

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Health, pursuant to subsections 30(1) and 30.5(1) of the Food and Drugs Act, makes the annexed Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Food — Various Subjects).


 

Sur recommandation de la ministre de la Santé et en vertu des paragraphes 30(1) et 30.5(1) de la Loi sur les aliments et drogues, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil prend le Règlement modifiant le Règlement sur les aliments et drogues (aliments — divers sujets), ci-après.

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Health, pursuant to subsections 30(1) and 30.5(1) of the Food and Drugs Act, makes the annexed Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Food — Various Subjects).
